title: Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin
description: Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 6 Reviews PartSelect Number PS16729788 Manufacturer Part Number WR71X38307 This door shelf bin is a genuine OEM replacement part designed for refrigerators. It is made of highly durable clear plastic, which allows users to easily view the contents of the bin. The bin is a storage compartment used to hold various items such as bottles, jars, and condiments. It provides a convenient way to store and organize food items for easy access. The bin is vulnerable to breakage, discoloration, and warping over time. The bin may also fail due to overloading or accidental impacts. Do not place any items in the bin if it is damaged as this may result in accidental spills and damage to the interior components of the refrigerator. No mounting hardware is needed for this repair.

installationInstructions.author: Mary Anne from CANDIA, NH
installationInstructions.title: broken bin
installationInstructions.content: i ordered the part and it arrived damaged.  I called, was told I would receive a return slip,  I called again a few days later, was told I  needed to send a picture of the damage, so the agent could submit it.  First I've heard  of this.  In the meantime, I did get a replacement bin.  I did get a refund for the damaged bin, but not for shipping charges. not at all happy
